title: [K-12] Collaborative Spatial Analysis and Digital Content Creation for Achieving Sustainable Development Goals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Geographic Information Systems (GIS) Understanding, Fundamental Wiki Editing Skills, and Statistical Data Processing Ability
context.additional_context: A program for mathematics majors to strengthen spatial data analysis and SDGs-linked competencies.

learning_goals: OpenStreetMap data can be utilized to analyze gender balance indicators in urban spaces with 85% accuracy
Systematically edit and link SDGs-related spatial data on Wikipedia to demonstrate digital citizenship competencies
Apply spatial information collected through collaborative mapping to mathematical modeling to propose solutions for sustainability challenges
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
